resources.string: 5+ portions of fruits and vegetables daily
An unhealthy diet increases your risk of being over weight. Try to eat more fruits and vegetables, at least 5 servings a day. Also try to reduce the amount of salt and saturated fats that you eat.
30+ minutes daily
Lack of physical activity increases risk of cardiovascular disease, diabetes and some cancers. Increase the amount of time you spend on physcial activity.
Stop smoking
Tobacco use increases risk for cancer, lung diseases, heart attack and stroke. Try to stop using tobacco from today onwards.
2 or less drinks per day
Consuming a lot of alcohol can damage the liver and increase your risk of mental illness and alcochol related death. Try to limit the amount of alcoh you consume each day.
